snippet: Fair Folks & a Goat is a membership-based coffee shop in Greenwich Village that also sells art, clothing, home design pieces and beer and wine.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column profiles Fair Folks & a Goat, membership-based coffee shop on Houston Street in Greenwich Village with hangout vibe that recalls older times in neighborhood.
lead_paragraph: Fair Folks & a Goat is a membership-based coffee shop in Greenwich Village that also sells art, clothing, home design pieces and beer and wine.

headline.main: A Membership-Based Coffee Shop in Greenwich Village
